description: [Water Curupira Pikabot Distribution](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0037) attached password-protected ZIP archives to deliver [Pikabot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1145) installers.(Citation: TrendMicro Pikabot 2024)
